On the dingmao day [4] the sun was hazy.
His Majesty should not sally forth
It ought not be that (the child-birth) will be a quick [猝] (delivery). (Or, possibly: It ought not be that (she) will (finish>) die (?) [卒] (in child-birth).
(we) should make an offering of decapitated human victims.
(we) should make an offering of decapitated human victims.
Fu Yang’s giving birth will be blessed [嘉] (i.e. a boy).
It is Wang Hai (who is exercising some affliction ?).
(We) should announce the king’s bone trouble
(we) should make an offering of a water buffalo.
(We) should not make an offering to Zu Yi.
To Cheng [k] x-sacrifice a water buffalo.
(We) should not make an offering to Cheng [成].
(we) should make an offering of decapitated human victims.
(we) should not make an offering of decapitated human victims.
一 二 三 四
(We) should in fact make a sheng 升 -presentation sacrifice of a piglet [𣫔]
一 二 三 四
His Majesty should [豕+卩] (meaning unknown) Fu Yi’s guesting (or bethel).
(He) should not [豕+卩] (meaning unknown) Fu Yi’s guesting (or bethel).
一 二 二告 三
(He) should [豕+卩] (meaning unknown) Bi Ji’s guesting (or bethel).
(We) should make an offering of eleven captives to the Ya (Secondary ?) Bi-ancestress(es)
(We) should issue a call to advance.
(We) should make Qiao’s handmaidens to enter (?). (Or: The handmaiden of Qiao who was contributed [or: entered] …. [The latter is an incomplete sentence.]
(We) should not make an offering to Nan Geng.
His Majesty’s nightmare [is not:] does not mean misfortunes.
一 二 三 四 五
We might not (receive:) harvest a (good) crop.
There will be no (cause for) making [misfortunes 禍].
There should be (cause for) making [misfortunes 禍].
